name: py2neo
description: Py2neo is a simple and pragmatic Python library that provides access to the popular graph database Neo4j via its RESTful web service interface. With no external dependencies, installation is straightforward and getting started with coding is easy. The library is actively maintained on GitHub, regularly updated in the Python Package Index and is built uniquely for Neo4j in close association with its team and community.
